mapper.select: SELECT USER_NUMBER, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_GENDER, USER_EMAIL, TO_CHAR(USER_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USER_BIRTH, USER_PHONE_NUMBER, USER_ADDRESS, USER_STATUS, STATUS_NAME FROM TBL_USER_STATUS S JOIN TBL_USER U ON S.STATUS_NUMBER = U.USER_STATUS AND U.USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber}

SELECT USER_NUMBER, USER_ID FROM TBL_USER
WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(USER_NUMBER) FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_STATUS = 1
SELECT COUNT(SITTER_NUMBER) FROM TBL_SITTER WHERE SITTER_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(APPLY_NUMBER) FROM TBL_SITTER_APPLY WHERE APPLY_STATUS = '승인 대기'
